summary:
Rather than solving the symptoms of P2P as they occur, it made perfect sense to look at the whole lifecycle of the process and define a lean and streamlined flow, with limited opportunities for defects and controls to capture the defects as they occur instead of waiting for full blown escalations.

After 10 years of working both in the UK and the NL as a P2P troubleshooting expert, focusing primarily on the Accounts payable part, especially helping troubled, in transition or “in-crises” Accounts Payable teams get back to a stable and structured status.
 
I set up my consultancy firm in 2014 offering a much more robust, structured, process and training led approach to procure-to-pay. It encompasses the full end-to-end lifecycle of the flow by focusing on a seamless process, a stress-free experience for all users within the process, world class queries resolution and a timely payment.

profile_positions.description: Provide solutions in procure to pay process from level 1 to level 5.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Manage both current Procurement Business Process Operations, Finance Processes and the business process optimization / transformation; Owner of identified improvement projects assisting with the prioritization and business case analysis/recommendation. I oversee the end to end tasks to drive Process Efficiency and serve as a project team lead in identified initiatives and continuous improvement projects both in finance(AP) and procurement
Manage changes to all Finance and Procurement templates and forms, including Forms of Contract, communication of policy changes considering applicable company Quality Standards. Implement changes internally and externally to Procurement via formal communications.
Work with internal and external resources, to unlock, integrate and develop to full potential all business systems in use for the end to end process. 
Analyze metrics and recommend remedial and/or improvement measures on best practices and compliance with Finance and company policies. Collaborate with peer leadership, benchmark against established industry benchmarks targeted towards optimization, leading the corrective action, as necessary.
Lead/Deliver Finance Policy and System training to the Company.
Establish, manage and continuously improve the Vendor Rating process/system within the company.  Feedback from all requesting stakeholders as well as collaborating with both the BPO and the Procurement teams to identify and implement strategies and/or Root Cause Corrective Action measures.
Liaise with the BPO for all matters related to reporting, systems and process improvements.
Roles Management – Leads the execution of composite roles to comply with Audits risks and Segregation of Duty conflicts, consistent with Company policies and procedures.
Triage and escalate errors/issues as needed for all end to end tools.
Lead team(s) to support testing of prioritized business system improvement.
Prepare Roll Out / Training /Update from a “System” perspective
profile_positions.title: Global Process Owner P2P

profile_positions.description:
Implement an end to end flow from purchase to pay
Operational and strategic management of the AP team
Design escalation flow and work to stabilise troubled AP department through training, engagement with third party suppliers and the internal stakeholders.
Design daily KPIs to drive down overdue
Identify bottleneck and drive changes to smooth out processes
Collaborate with the business to drive change management to improve PO adoption
Develop training manuals and organise training 
•	For AP on invoices handling and processing
•	For senior managers for approvals
•	For business users on purchase requisition creation; goods receipts and PO change requests
Manage the central buying hub, owner of purchase order movement
Responsible for PO placement and creation, and maintenance using both sharepoint and SAP
PO changes in compliance with global and regional policies and requirement
Identify opportunities for automation and implement to the improve, speed up and increase accuracy. Familiar with automation and robotics tools (Winshuttle/winautomation/processrobot/uPerform) among others.
SAP and open text super user
profile_positions.title: P2P Implémentation Lead & Change Manager

profile_positions.description:
Manage a team of 24 FTE (11 in a SSC in Amsterdam 13 outsourced Accounts Payable in Pune (India)
Setting up, implementing and managing the P2i and i2P functions in SSC and the outsourced BPO.
Establish both proactive and reactive process optimization processes and improvements within the SSC and the outsourced team.
Creation, implementation and management of the P2P Purchase-to-pay process within AP and setting up of the tools necessary to achieve this effectively and accurately and in a timely fashion.
Setting up and establish roles and responsibilities for the senior and junior support teams both in the Netherlands and in India.
Maintaining approval workflow and matrix and provide local support for the business and outside stakeholders.
Established and monitored compliance's in regards to NON-PO invoices (maintain exception list and outside the tolerances items processes).
Reconciliations: Banks, Inter-company, IR/GR and sundry reconciliations for all sisters’ entities etc…
Support the SSC and internal organisation in critical Month End close activities according to closing script.
Payments - Review and approval of payment run proposals
Design, maintain, monitor and enforce escalations processes. 
Provide support to the AP Processors in case of complex entries and processes. 
Review and approval of SOP changes
Calibration: Regular spot check on the team performance, review, feedback and plan of action to support and raise FTE performance level.
Supports external audits and SOX 404 internal control audits, and assists in providing support for related accounts payable request
Vendor Master Data maintenance and management in SAP
Direct Debit and manual payment monitoring.
Receipt, research and resolve a variety of routine internal and external inquiries concerning account status, including communicating the resolution of discrepancies to appropriate persons.
SAP testing for new modules.
profile_positions.title: P2P Operations Manager
Financial Accountant - Account Payable and GL Accountant

profile_positions.description:
Manage and set up the SSC AP operations team
Train and oversee the work of 4 Accounts Payable Specialist 
Oversight of all accounts payable processes, including vendor relationship management, invoice coding and input, processing customer refunds, and first level partner reconciliations 
Perform and supervise month-end closing processes within Accounts Payable to ensure all tasks are completed timely 
Manages the timely and accurate completion and documentation of accounts payable related to account reconciliations and tie-out of the accounts payable sub-ledger to the general ledger maintained by the Corporate Accounting Department 
Create, enhance and monitor Accounts Payable reporting to assist in daily and period close analysis 
Handle calls/emails from vendors and business units on items such as requests for invoice status, providing documentation, and working account reconciliations with our vendors 
Supports the external quarterly reviews, annual audits and SOX 404 internal control audits, and assists in providing support for related accounts payable requests 
Develop, improve and document all processes within the Accounts Payable department 
Fosters and maintains key relationships throughout the organization in order to facilitate teamwork across departments
profile_positions.title: Account Payable Team Supervisor – GL Accountant

profile_positions.description:
Leadership & Stability: Provides leadership, stability and structure to account payable teams “in crisis” or in transition due to transformation, restructuring, leadership change, outsourcing etc.

Accounts Payable transformation: Developed and implemented Account Payable or Procure to pay transformation projects to empower and build a “fit-for-purpose” AP team with stress-tested, scalable processes and clearly defined roles and responsibilities.

Training & Training Materials: Provide training, create training material (SOPs and BOPs) and a clean handover of a stabilized department to the retained organization (Accounts Payable Managers, Team Leads, AP specialists etc.…)

Change management, communication & queries handling: Involve and engage all stakeholders affected by P2P/AP processes to ensure greater understanding of the process, better cooperation and a more cohesive in-house approach.
Build communication lines and clear-cut support path to allow for issues to be raised timely, in the right manner and with the right team and avoid wildfire escalations and business disruptions.

Management: Managed small in-house teams as well as teams of dozens of P2P specialists spread across several countries and continents (India, Poland, Netherlands, UK, Sweden) 

Technology & Systems Implementation: I have led and spearheaded the implementation of ERP, automation and robotics tools in a variety of companies, I am a reliable and dependable implementation project manager.
profile_positions.title: ACCOUNTS PAYABLE PROCESS EXPERT

profile_positions.title: ACCOUNTS PAYABLE MANAGER

profile_positions.description:
Oversee and manage the EMEA sales team performance (Over 220 Employees)
Manage the Sales Bookings Data spread over several systems in the network (Business Object, Sales-force and an in House system 
Manage the CRM Closed Deals data 
Manage inter- theater compensation process 
Provide accurate Sales Performance Reporting to the Sales Teams and Management 
Participate in the annual quota setting process and issuing of Sales Incentive Plans. 
Daily, Weekly and Quarterly sales reporting and forecast analysis to support the senior Management Team
profile_positions.title: Finance & Business Analyst - EMEA Compensation Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for moving the billing from the FSSC in Budapest to Amsterdam 
Accounts receivable/Billing specialist 
Maintaining Master data in regards to taxation for different countries 
Inter-company and Sundry debtor's reconciliation, 
Staff and customer’s queries resolutions 
Credit Control
profile_positions.title: Billing and Credit Control Specialist

profile_positions.description:
After 2 years at Amazon, I worked as a crisis consultant for various firms within the UK
Responsibilities:
Financial reporting and payments process implementation
Various System implementation work (Oracle 11i – SAP – Dimension)
Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable Specialist/ Team Lead - (Matching, Batching, and Coding, weekly and monthly payments runs)
AP/AR Troubleshooting
Cleaning up backlog; AP and AR issues within the financial system
Setting up better and/or improved companies AP and AR system process
Putting together processes guidebook in Word, Visio or PowerPoint.
Credit Control
Extensive reconciliation experience
Multi currency banks reconciliation
Inter-company reconciliation - Self Billing and month end reporting
Suppliers and sundry debtors reconciliation
Month end reconciliation
Aged creditors reports
Multi currency petty cash account reconciliation (Sterling, Dollars and Euros).
General Ledger management and Journals posting
Recording; posting and monitoring incoming funds.
Multi currency and cross border payments using online banking systems(Barclays Business Master, Sogecash, HSBC, BofA)
Disputes and queries resolutions, both internal and suppliers/customers related
Setting up and maintaining Direct Debit payments 
Loan and Assets Management; Fixed and currents assets reconciliation. 
Calculation of bad debts provision based on adopted policy
Clearance of suspense accounts
Employee's expenses auditing and settlements according to company procedures. 
Assist in preparation of audit schedules.
Respond to staff queries on financial procedures. 
Dealing with suppliers and staff queries regarding invoices and payments 
Liaising with companies staff to unsure transactions are made according to company policies 
End of month reports and closing the general ledger
profile_positions.title: Shared Services Centre Crisis Consultant (AP, AR, GL, Credit Control)
